articles.title: Korean Woman Athlete Bags Gold Medal in Int'l Marathon Race
articles.content:
Korean Woman Athlete Bags Gold Medal in Int'l Marathon Race 
   Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Phyo Un Suk, woman athlete of the DPRK, placed first in the 25th Macao International Marathon Race held on Dec. 3.
 She came first to win a gold medal by clocking two hours, 38 minutes, 27 seconds in the marathon race that brought together ace athletes from many countries and regions.

Vice-Premier Meets Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
Vice-Premier Meets Russian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Vice-premier of the DPRK Cabinet Ro Tu Chol met and had a conversation with Russian Ambassador Andrei Karlov who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Lao Ambassador
   Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Lao Ambassador Chanpheng Sihaphom who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
